channel.title: My first server, im not very technical and need help!
channel.description:
ok guys i really need help and id truly appreciate it. ive done the port forewarding thing, made my no-ip server, and downloaded java and moparscape. i checked off the box next to my servername in the no-ip program, but the thing will not let me log on. i have done the firewall thing as well to let it access my server. plz ppl, what do i do? first ppl to help and if im able to get my server on with ur advice, u get to be a mod!!!!!!!!!!!!!
zamorakscape....in the future... barrage w lvl 1 magic!!!!!no runes needed!!!!!!!!hopefully, castle wars!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! make fally a pking area( in memory of teh fally massacre.... ) and.... SOME spawning for non admins maybe like just barrows.........and you can transform!(transform idea from thatoneserver.no-ip.org

item.title: My first server, im not very technical and need help!
item.dc:creator: @5harp 5harp
item.description:
@5harp wrote:

i did all u did 2 and i did “localhost” for the server and then people could join. see if it works for u

5harpscape.no-ip.biz

Read full topic
